about_the_game:
Play as aspiring botanist, Koru, on her journey to Wilder County to start an apprenticeship with the elusive Dr. Linny.


In this detailed hand-drawn world, join Koru and become a member of the Wilder Botanical Society, investigating the local ecology and unraveling the mysteries of its weird and wonderful flora.

Your ticket to Wilder County awaits! Take a trip from the everyday and escape to this lush landscape full of exotic plants and curiosities.


From a cycle in the nearby Two-Storm Woods, to a gentle row across the Evernight Lake - there's always something new to enjoy.

Work your way up the ranks of the Wilder Botanical Society as you find and identify more intricate and unique specimens.


With a set of tools and a tea-making kit, discover the wonders of the natural world in an atmospheric and relaxing environment.

Keep an eye out for the papers too - with more successful plant identifications, you may start gaining a reputation in the Science Journals!

Enjoy a heartfelt narrative as Koru enters the next chapter of her life in a new and wild town.


Stories are just as abundant as the plants in Wilder County, so you may want to take some time to find out a bit about the mysterious land, or catch up with a local over a cuppa at the Tea Rooms.

Use your botanical knowledge to help others!


With an array of plant-based extracts and ointments, keep an eye out for the odd job here and there within the bustling Wilderton.
